p: As shown in Figure 5 (Bi, Bii) the c- myc as cell cycle components and the cell cycle regulator protein (cyclin D1)were down-expressed within 6 h of teucrium essential oil treatment, whereas Intercellular adhesion molecule-1 (ICAM1), an inhibitor of apoptosis protein (IAP)-1, IAP-2 proteins were not down-regulated, even after 12 h of treatment in HCT-116 cells. Complete abrogation of most gene expression appeared upon treatment with 100 pg/mL TA-1.
